title: Sri Lanka says UN chief ‘acted in haste’ with envoy recall
content: COLOMBO (AFP) – Sri Lanka said Friday that UN chief Ban Ki-moon had “acted in haste” by recalling his top envoy on the island in response to angry protests over a UN war crimes panel.
